data.enText: to give all your attention to sth and not think about anything else

data.chText: 吵闹声不绝于耳，我无法集中精神。
data.enText: I can't concentrate with all that noise going on.

data.chText: 没有什么比知道自己明天就可能会死去更能让人定下心来去思考种种问题的了。
data.enText: Nothing concentrates the mind better than the knowledge that you could die tomorrow (= it makes you think very clearly) .

data.chText: 我决定全力以赴找个住的地方。
data.enText: I decided to concentrate all my efforts on finding somewhere to live.
to bring sth together in one place

data.chText: 权力主要集中在少数精英人物的手里。
data.enText: Power is largely concentrated in the hands of a small elite.

data.chText: 我们需要把资源集中用于最衰败的地区。
data.enText: We need to concentrate resources on the most run-down areas.

data.chText: 战斗集中在北方诸城镇的周围进行。
data.enText: Fighting was concentrated around the towns to the north.
to increase the strength of a substance by reducing its volume, for example by boiling it
to spend more time doing one particular thing than others

data.chText: 这一节课我将着重讲查理王朝的早期统治时期。
data.enText: In this lecture I shall concentrate on the early years of Charles's reign.
a substance that is made stronger because water or other substances have been removed
mineral concentrates found at the bottom of rivers
jams made with fruit juice concentrate

simple_means.memory_skill: con 加强 + centr 中心；中间 + ate 使… → 使…成为中心 → 集中

data.enText: to spend more time doing one particular thing than others

data.chText: 这一节课我将着重讲查理王朝的早期统治时期。
data.enText: In this lecture I shall concentrate on the early years of Charles's reign.

tr: a concentrated form of a foodstuff
the bulk is reduced by removing water
the desired mineral that is left after impurities have been removed from mined ore
cook until very little liquid is left
example: The cook reduced the sauce by boiling it for a long time

tr: be cooked until very little liquid is left
example: The sauce should reduce to one cup
condense the contents of a book into a summary
Congress condensed the three-year plan into a six-month plan
The Russian government centralized the distribution of food
Please focus on your studies and not on your hobbies

tr: draw together or meet in one common center
example: These groups concentrate in the inner cities

value.def: If you concentrate on something, or concentrate your mind on it, you give all your attention to it.

example.ex: It was up to him to concentrate on his studies and make something of himself...
example.tran: 是否能专心学习并取得一定成就要靠他自己。

example.ex: Water companies should concentrate on reducing waste instead of building new reservoirs...
example.tran: 自来水公司应该集中精力减少水浪费，而不是修建新水库。

example.ex: At work you need to be able to concentrate...
example.tran: 工作的时候必须要做到聚精会神。

example.ex: This helps you to be aware of time and concentrates your mind on the immediate task.
example.tran: 这有助于你掌握时间，全神贯注于眼前的任务。

value.def: If something is concentrated in an area, it is all there rather than being spread around.

example.ex: Italy's industrial districts are concentrated in its north-central and north-eastern regions...
example.tran: 意大利的工业区集中在该国中北部和东北部地区。

example.ex: Most development has been concentrated in and around cities.
example.tran: 土地开发主要集中在城市及周边地区。

value.def: Concentrate is a liquid or substance from which water has been removed in order to make it stronger, or to make it easier to store.

example.tran: 用浓缩橙汁冲兑的橙汁

value.def: If you say that an unpleasant fact or situation concentrates someone's mind, you mean that it makes them think clearly, because they are aware of the serious consequences if they do not.

example.ex: A term in prison will concentrate his mind wonderfully.
example.tran: 一想到要被判刑，他的头脑就会变得非常清醒。

trans: 专心于，把思想集中于；将…集中于…
锌精矿；精炼锌；阿拉伯联合酋长国求购锌
大豆浓缩蛋白；浓缩大豆蛋白；豆蛋白质；黄豆浓缩蛋白
集中在；集中在,专心于；专心于

partsOfSpeech.dec: a 无 + centr 中心；中间 + ic …的 → 无中心的
centr 中心；中间 + al …的 → 中心的
centri 中心；中间 + fug 逃 + e → 使逃出中心 → 离心力
centri 中心；中间 + pet 寻求 + al …的，具有…性质的 → 寻求中心的 → 向心的
con 加强 + centr 中心；中间 + ate 使… → 使…成为中心 → 集中
con 共同 + centr 中心；中间 + ic 某种药 → 同心的；集中的
ec〔= e 出〕+ centr 中心；中间 + ic 某种药 → 偏离中心的 → 古怪的
ego 自我 + centr 中心；中间 + ic 某种药 → 以自我为中心的
